title: Art Nouveau typeface
content:
I was wondering if anyone may know the name of the font attached.  
Apologies for the bad pic. It was from a 60’s Graphis magazine.

Also could anyone possibly suggest a nice Art Nouveau styled typeface for  
a similar purpose to the attached pic?

Cheers!
